department: INDIGENOUS RELATIONS AND NORTHERN AFFAIRS CANADA
short_summary: Request for Scanners For Indigenous Relations And Northern Affairs Canada
description: Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada requires supply, delivery, installation, training, and support & maintenance services for 5 scanners. Delivery date: October 11, 2023. For 4 scanners: National Capital Region in Gatineau, Quebec; for 1 scanner: Winnipeg, Manitoba. Request is under CFTA, CPTPP, WTO GPA and other agreements listed Security requirements - NONE. Min price selection criterion.
full_summary:
## Solicitation Notice: Scanning Equipment Request for Proposal
**Official Reference:** WS3785747079-Doc4013686011  
**Amendment:** 7  
**Publication Date:** May 18, 2023  
**Closing Date:** August 15, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)  
**Last Date for Receiving Tenders:** August 15, 2023

### Tender Brief

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)  
**Proposed Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and Department of Indigenous Services (ISC)  
**Project Overview:** The Government of Canada is seeking to acquire scanning equipment with delivery and installation services to support the Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) and Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC).

### Tender Details

* **UNSPSC Code:** 43211711  
* **Description:** Scanners  
* **Trade Agreements:** 
  + Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  + Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  + Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  + Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  + Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  + Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Tender Requirements

* The successful bidder will be required to supply, deliver, install, train, and provide support and maintenance services for five (5) scanners.
* One (1) scanner will be delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR) mailroom in Gatineau, Quebec, and the remaining four (4) will be delivered to Winnipeg, Manitoba.
* The requested delivery date for all five (5) scanners is October 9, 2023.
* There are no security requirements associated with this requirement.

#### Contact Information

**Bidders Contact:** 
Name: Sean Brazeau  
Position: Internal Consultation  
Email: sean.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
